name: Galaxial Crack Shot
description:
Are you ready to shoot some cute yellow aliens to stop them blowing you up? Galaxial Crack Shot is game you can enjoy on your own or with a friend. The fast gameplay and challenging mechanics make sure you are on the edge of your seat all the time. Get Ready!

In single player mode, you are basically collecting points to rack up a high score.

In two player mode, you are fighting together with your friend, but also competing on who collects the most points.

The game has a session based save system. As long as you don't quit to desktop, it will keep your score intact. Share your highest scores with the hashtag #galaxialcrackshot and post them on Instagram!

The game supports gamepads, such as the DS4 and the XBONE controller. Other controllers haven't been tested.

Keyboard controls are only available in single player mode(WASD to move, arrow keys to shoot) NOTE: The game is a lot more difficult with keyboard controls.

Screenshots are from the beta build.
